product_name: Black Diamond NRG2 Rechargeable Battery Kit
long_description: The Black Diamond NRG2 rechargeable battery kit is designed specifically for use with the Black Diamond Orbit lantern, sold separately. With this compact recharging kit, there's no hassling with single-use batteries or separate battery chargers. Simply replace the base of your lantern with the rechargeable NiMH battery base included with the NRG2 kit and plug the wall charger into the lantern. Travel at home and abroad with your Orbit lantern; kit includes 3 European power adapters and 1 U.S. power adapter. Battery power meter indicates the charging status. Please note: The NRG2 rechargeable battery kit is only compatible with the Black Diamond Orbit lantern.
short_description: The Black Diamond NRG2 rechargeable battery kit is designed specifically for use with the Black Diamond Orbit lantern, sold separately.
